summary: "Xena: Warrior Princess" is an American fantasy TV show that aired from 1995 to 2001. Created by Robert Tapert, it stars Lucy Lawless as Xena, a warrior seeking redemption. Xena travels with her best friend Gabrielle (Renee O'Connor), helping the defenseless with her fighting skills. The show started as a spin-off of "Hercules: The Legendary Journeys" and became very popular, airing in over 108 countries. It led to many products like comics and video games. A reboot was planned but later canceled by NBC.
title: Xena Warrior Princess
